      • lookup

        public static final int lookup(java.lang.CharSequence text,
                               KawapadSelection.CharSelector selector,
                               int position,
                               int step)
        This method looks up the specified character from the passed CharSequence object. When the specified character was not found, returns -1 when the "step" is lower than zero and returns text.length() when the "step" is higher than zero. This throws IllegalArgumentException when step is zero.
